headline: Bain further delays Fuji Soft tender offer plans, awaits company approval
summary: Bain Capital now expects to launch its tender offer for Japan's Fuji Soft in mid-to-late November as it continues to await company approval, the private equity firm announced on Monday, amid a buyout...

headline: Chip Gear Maker ASMPT Calls Off Privatization Talks
